My Portfolio

See how I can help you grow your business.

Coin Dash

Cryptocurrency dashboard with thousands of searchable coins. Uses localStorage to allow users to pick and set favorite coins. Built using React.js, styled-components library, and the CryptoCompare API.

WebsiteGithub

Homeview

Robust site supporting tenant-landlord interaction with user authentication, stripe payments API, and support for maintenance requests. Built using Javascript ES6+, pure CSS3, Node.js and MongoDB for the backend database.

WebsiteGithub

River City Hardwood Flooring

Web and mobile site designed for marketing and lead generation. Built using CSS3 Animations, Javascript ES6+, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes form for sending estimate inquiries to the company server.

WebsiteGithub

Starfindr Search

Search engine utilizes the NASA open source API of images to give the user a unique look into the archives of NASAâ€™s media. Built using CSS3, JS, Node.js and AJAX/Axios for API interaction.

Chattie Kathy

Chat room application that allows users to chat with anyone in the world. Chat with a unique username or choose to go anonymous. Built using CSS3, Javascript and Websockets for server-client communication.

WebsiteGithub

Sweet's Bakery

Web and mobile bakery site with product gallery and landing page. Features cart and Paypal functionality. Built using React.js, styled-components library, and Paypal payments API.
